name: Birdz Browser
description:
This is a short experimental project that allows you to explore a variety of 90s inspired web designs. Each of the buttons on the home page takes you to a new place to explore, a few even have little minigames. Its a bit rough around the edges, but was made from the ground up in about 5 weeks.

navigation on the main hub is done by dragging to move around, its a bit janky but hey you have to release stuff eventually.

All the code is licensed under the GPL 3.0 license, Kiki's art is licensed under Creative Commons attribution Share-Alike, and Dialogic is licensed under the MIT License.

Visual design by Kiki Bajer

Programming and direction by protodrew

see my sourcecode!
